aux_program:
% Predicates for (adjacent) cells
cell(R,C) :- setting(row(R)), setting(col(C)).
direction(left;right;up;down).
movement(R,C,R,C+1,right) :- cell(R,C), cell(R,C+1).
movement(R,C,R,C-1,left) :- cell(R,C), cell(R,C-1).
movement(R,C,R+1,C,down) :- cell(R,C), cell(R+1,C).
movement(R,C,R-1,C,up) :- cell(R,C), cell(R-1,C).
adjacent(R1,C1,R2,C2) :- direction(D), movement(R1,C1,R2,C2,D).

% Waypoints
waypoint(1..3).
level_gen_program:
% The game is played on a 8x6 grid
#const w=8.
#const h=6.
#const n=w*h.
setting(grid_width(w)).
setting(grid_height(h)).
setting(row(1..H)) :- setting(grid_height(H)).
setting(col(1..W)) :- setting(grid_width(W)).

% Time bound: 2*n steps
setting(time_bound(2*n)).

% Player is randomly placed
1 { at(R,C,player) : cell(R,C) } 1.
% Flag is randomly placed
1 { at(R,C,flag) : cell(R,C) } 1.
% Waypoints are randomly placed
1 { at(R,C,waypoint(W)) : cell(R,C) } 1 :- waypoint(W).
% ... but not directly adjacent
:- at(R1,C1,I1), at(R2,C2,I2), I1 != I2, adjacent(R1,C1,R2,C2),
    I1 != tree, I2 != tree.

% Player and flag are not too close
:- at(R1,C1,player), at(R2,C2,flag),
    |R1-R2| + |C1-C2| <= 4.
% Different waypoints are not too close
:- at(R1,C1,waypoint(W1)), at(R2,C2,waypoint(W2)), W1 < W2,
    |R1-R2| + |C1-C2| <= 4.

% Several are placed at random
10 { at(R,C,tree) : cell(R,C) } 15.
% ... but not horizontally/vertically adjacent to each other
:- adjacent(R1,C1,R2,C2), at(R1,C1,tree), at(R2,C2,tree).
% ... and so that every cell contains at most one item
:- at(R,C,I1), at(R,C,I2), I1 != I2.
% ... and so that there is a (tree-free) path from the player to the flag
pos_step(1..2*n).
{ step(S) } :- pos_step(S).
:- not step(1).
step(S-1) :- step(S), pos_step(S-1).
1 { step(R,C,S) : cell(R,C) } 1 :- step(S).
:- step(R1,C1,S), step(R2,C2,S+1), not adjacent(R1,C1,R2,C2).
:- at(R,C,tree), step(R,C,S).
:- at(R,C,player), not step(R,C,1).
:- at(R,C,flag), step(R,C,S), step(S+1).
max_step(M) :- step(M), not step(M+1).
:- max_step(S), at(R,C,flag), not step(R,C,S).
% ... that visits all waypoints
:- waypoint(W), at(R,C,waypoint(W)), not step(R,C,S) : step(S).
% ... and visits each waypoint before the next
:- waypoint(W1), waypoint(W2), W1 < W2,
    at(R1,C1,waypoint(W1)), at(R2,C2,waypoint(W2)),
    step(R2,C2,S2), not step(R1,C1,S1) : step(S1), S1 < S2.
% (some symmetry breaking)
:- step(R1,C1,S), step(R2,C2,S+1), step(R1,C1,S+2).

debug(step(R,C,S)) :- step(R,C,S).

% Randomize level generation
#heuristic at(RANDINT(1,8),RANDINT(1,12),player). [10,true]
#heuristic at(RANDINT(1,8),RANDINT(1,12),flag). [10,true]

#heuristic at(RANDINT(1,6),RANDINT(1,8),tree). [10,true]

#heuristic at(RANDINT(1,6),RANDINT(1,8),tree). [10,true]
#heuristic at(RANDINT(1,6),RANDINT(1,8),tree). [10,true]
#heuristic at(RANDINT(1,6),RANDINT(1,8),tree). [10,true]

% Visualization instructions
decorate(game_type,grid).
decorate(label,flag,font_f024).
decorate(label,player,font_f007).
decorate(label,tree,font_f1bb).
decorate(label,waypoint(W),W) :- waypoint(W).
decorate(color,waypoint(W),orange) :- waypoint(W).
decorate(color,tree,green).
visibility_program:
% Everything is observable
observe(at(R,C,O)) :- at(R,C,O), not hidden(at(R,C,O)).

% Except waypoints when a player is at them
hidden(at(R,C,waypoint(W))) :- at(R,C,waypoint(W)), at(R,C,player).
player_move_program:
% Hints:
% - make a plan consisting of a path towards the flag
% - and then follow the path
nature_program:
% The player can do at most one action per time step
:- do(X), do(Y), X != Y.

% Effect of move(up;down;left;right): the player moves in the appropriate direction
move_result(R2,C2) :- do(move(D)), direction(D),
    at(R1,C1,player), movement(R1,C1,R2,C2,D).
next(R,C,player) :- move_result(R,C).
next(R,C,player) :- at(R,C,player), not move_result(R',C') : cell(R',C').

% The player can't pass through trees
:- next(R,C,player), at(R,C,tree).

% The flag and trees stay in place
next(R,C,flag) :- at(R,C,flag).
next(R,C,tree) :- at(R,C,tree).

% Waypoints disappear as they are visited
next(R,C,waypoint(W)) :- at(R,C,waypoint(W)), not at(R,C,player).
goal_program:
% Goal: reach the flag after visiting all waypoints
win :- at(R1,C1,player), at(R1,C1,flag),
    not at(R2,C2,waypoint(W)) : cell(R2,C2), waypoint(W).

% You lose if you visit the flag before all waypoints
lose(wrong_order) :- at(R1,C1,player), at(R1,C1,flag),
    at(R2,C2,waypoint(W)), waypoint(W).

% You lose if you visit a waypoint while a previous waypoint remains to visit
lose(wrong_order) :- at(R1,C1,player), at(R1,C1,waypoint(W1)),
    at(R2,C2,waypoint(W2)), W2 < W1.

% You lose if time runs out..
lose(timeout) :- current_time(T), setting(time_bound(S)), T >= S.
